title: Billiards, Microwave, Detached Garages, Smoke-Free
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 956 Sq.
Welcome to the newest apartment community in the Pacific Northwest.
Immersed in rich cultural history, the community of Edgewood, WA offers the perfect combination of work-life balance.
The Arbors at Edgewood apartments includes a wide range of modern amenities catered to make your life easier.
Being close to the outdoors while also minutes from I-5 and downtown Tacoma is a commuter’s dream and an offering that we are proud to provide.
At The Arbors at Edgewood, you can choose a layout that perfectly fits your needs.
Escape to your own oasis within one of our spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
We spare no expense to ensure that your home at our pet-friendly community provides everything you need and more.

Stainless Steel Appliances, Microwave, Modern Electric Fireplace, Dishwasher, Washer & Dryer, CAT 5 Wiring, Craftsman Cabinetry, Linen Closet*, Separate Dining Area, Walk-in Closet*, Modern Hardwood-Style Flooring, Painted Millwork, Large Deck or Patio with Storage*, Granite Counters, Designer Accents, Vaulted Ceilings*, Additional Storage, Nine Foot Ceilings

24 Hour Fitness Center, Barbecue Area, Billiards, Walking Trails, On-Site Management, Online Payments Available, Valet Trash & Recycling Service, Media Lounge, Clubhouse with Complimentary Wi-Fi, Off Leash Bark Park, Night Patrol, Playground, Package Receiving, Basketball Court, Detached Garages, Smoke-Free, On-Site Maintenance, Heated Outdoor Pool and Barbecue Deck, Covered Parking, Sports Court
One-time Fee: $200 per cat / $300 per dog
